bio:
PhD - Psychology; Licensed Professional counselor
University Professor - psychology/mental health courses/ 
Skills - online teaching/ assessment/ problem solving
Coaching - Individual and groups
Crisis Intervention

Dr Brawley offers an interdisciplinary approach to treatment. This could include traditional talk therapy, assessments, journaling, dream analysis, writing, viewing movies, reading/writing poetry, learning mindfulness meditation and using other creative art forms.  She  responds to the unique needs of each person. She promotes harmony among the physical, psychological, emotional, spiritual, interpersonal, and vocational aspects of each person's life. She believes that people want the best in life and to be their authentic selves.
Monday - Friday; 9:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Central Standard Time Zone or email

bio:
I am Senior Full Stack Developer with over 9 years professional experience within the creative industry.

I have a pragmatic and robust approach to development and have expertise in full life cycle development, OOP, Agile methodologies and TDD.

My portfolio includes database applications, rich user experiences, games and scalable services for web, mobile and desktop.



Recent Technologies:
PHP, CakePHP, CodeIgniter, Lavarel, WordPress, Magento, Javascript, JQuery, XML, MS SQL, HTML5, JQuery MOBILE, Adobe Photoshop / Illustrator,Google Charts, Amazon AWS, Magento, Prestashop

Recent Projects:

#eCommerce website using Magento, with custom payment gateway implementation and module customization for product search functionality

Approach:

I take pride in my service, approaching projects with business insight and pragmatic development techniques. I ensure that the solutions I provide, serve my clients interests well into the future.


Portfolio Summary:
#IOS and Android Development
#Bespoke Content Management Systems (CMS)
#E-Commerce
#Data Analysis and Relational Database systems
#Websites



Career Summary:

I started my career developing eCommerce websites, Android IOS applications, bespoke PHP web applications to deliver expertise solution to cater development needs. After working for several small scale to large scale organization I finally settle down as a fulltime freelancer since last 3 years. I have catered over 120+ clients worldwide and delivered over 250+ projects in span of 3 years.

I can work with fixed price arrangements or hourly rates.

Feel free to contact me for an initial free consultation.

Kind regards,

Mr. Vyas

We work Mon - Friday 9AM to 5PM
Payment Terms : 30% at start of work, 40% Midway payment, 30% final demo on our staging server.

abstrac: Hi! My name is Becky Coble, and I provide financial support and bookkeeping solutions for both your small business and individual needs.
bio:
Let me tell you a bit about myself. I graduated from Western Kentucky with a major in Economics, a major in Marketing and a minor in Computer Information Systems.

Over the course of my career, I have worked with multiple companies in the areas of business management, admin and consulting with a specialization in new business development and growth.

In 2011, I founded a wellness company in Nashville, Tn where I still act as business manager and business consultant for the company to this day.

My career experience taught me that I have a passion to help businesses succeed. 

So my newest venture is a Financial and Bookkeeping Solutions business geared to aid the small businesses which I love to serve.

I handle all day-to-day financial needs of small business owners just like you, doing my part to make the businesses more efficient, effective and profitable. I can help you save time and money.

My interests outside of work are my family, health, cooking and crafting.

abstrac: Illustrations, doodles, comics, and cartoons... Kristophized.
bio: Budding cartoonist Kristopher Williams lives in Canoga Park, CA. Williams' work is influenced by popular culture including 90's cartoons, anime and manga, science fiction films. The son of a musician, he is also a fan of classic funk/soul, jazz, as well as Blaxploitation films. Williams’ other hobbies include street-dancing and martial arts. He is a a recent graduate of CSU Northridge. Williams works with traditional media, Adobe flash, and Adobe photoshop. He has studied under respected industry professionals, including Steven Theis and Mark Farquhar. Williams graduated with a Bachelor's in Art with a specialization in animation in 2012.
